description_text:
Hello, so I've been using the simsonn pro X pedals for a few months and
love them, but unfortunately I cannot find a throttle replacement spring
that feels like the one that came with the pedals,

Do you guys have a set of 2 throttle springs I can order to get my sim rig
up and going again?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jonathan Williams,    Please provide your order number and a photo of all the accessories you received, so I can help you check if everything is complete.

Please see attached image, this is my original purchase receipt from
Amazon. It did come with everything but the throttle spring broke after a
few months of use. Thankfully I had a backup but now that one is showing
stress cracks.

That mainly why I need replacement throttle springs.

On Sun, Oct 12, 2025, 4:37 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Jonathan Williams,    Please take a photo of the damaged spring, and we’ll send you a new one free of charge tomorrow.  Also, please provide your contact name, phone number, and address so we can arrange the shipment.

Also I received these awhile ago, I had them put together and assembled
correctly, adjusted to my preference and used for a few months, after a few
months it broke,

I just ordered some springs using the dimensions and will be using those.

Kinda disappointed with the response I got and lack there of after I sent
the info of my pedal set.

i would work on follow ups.

Sincerely a simsonn customer.

On Sun, Oct 12, 2025, 4:46 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Jonathan Williams,     Hello, we replied to you 15 days ago and requested that you provide your shipping address for a replacement, but it seems you did not receive our email.
